data.comment: The match is underway in Kanagawa.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Shinji Murakami signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
In the minute 3, In Kanagawa, Joao Schmidt (Nagoya) misses the target with a header.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 4, In Kanagawa Shonan attack through Naoki Yamada. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Nagoya at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Nagoya push forward at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka and Mu Kanazaki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan's Mitsuki Saito is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shinji Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 12, Shinji Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 18, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
Shinji Murakami awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 23, Shinji Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shinji Murakami signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Shonan.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yuki Soma for Nagoya gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan are caught offside.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 35, Shinji Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 36, Nagoya are pushing forward but Ryogo Yamasaki's finish is wide of the goal.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Shinji Murakami signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Shonan's area.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Nagoya's Mateus breaks free at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Shinji Murakami awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Nagoya at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shinji Murakami will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Shonan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Shinji Murakami has blown to start the second-half.
Nagoya drives forward and Mu Kanazaki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shinji Murakami signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
In the minute 55, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's first substitution at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka with Naoki Maeda replacing Yuki Soma.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a second substitution, with Gabriel Xavier replacing Ryogo Yamasaki.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Kanagawa.
The home team have replaced Naoki Yamada with Temma Matsuda. This is the first substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
In the minute 57, Tarik Elyounoussi is replacing Yuto Iwasaki for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Nagoya are whistled for offside.
In the minute 59, Shonan push upfield but Shinji Murakami quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Shonan to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 63, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Shinji Murakami awards Shonan a goal kick.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Oh Jae-suk replacing Yutaka Yoshida.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Shinji Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Shonan make their third substitution with Hirokazu Ishihara replacing Shota Kobayashi.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 76, Shinji Murakami signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Naoki Ishihara for Shonan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Naoki Ishihara returns to the field for Shonan after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Shonan.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
Nagoya's Naoki Maeda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Shinji Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Shinji Murakami.
In the minute 82, Free kick Shonan.
Mateus (Nagoya) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kazuaki Mawatari (Shonan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
Shinji Murakami waits before resuming play because Joao Schmidt for Nagoya is still down.
Joao Schmidt has recovered and rejoins the match in Kanagawa.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Nagoya at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Naoki Ishihara for Shonan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Shinji Murakami awards Nagoya a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Shonan.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Free kick in a good position for Nagoya!
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Takuya Okamoto for Shonan has been booked by Shinji Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
Toichi Suzuki is replacing Takuya Okamoto for the home team.
Hiroshi Ibusuki is on a sub for Mitsuki Saito for Shonan.
